law.catch_line: Publication of lists of delinquent taxes by cities -- Fee allowance.
law.text: Cities may publish a list of uncollected delinquent taxes levied under Section 181 of the Kentucky Constitution, showing the name of and the amount due from each delinquent taxpayer, to be advertised by newspaper publication. A fee equal to the prorated cost of publication per taxpayer per publication may be added to the amount of each tax claim published as publication costs.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 69, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 7, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. â€“ Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 23.
